fields.title: Senior Django Developer
fields.description:
We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Django Developer to join our growing team. You will work on scalable web applications with a focus on best practices and clean code architecture.

Responsibilities:
- Design and develop RESTful APIs
- Implement database optimizations
- Mentor junior developers
- Code review and quality assurance

What we offer:
- Competitive salary package
- Flexible working hours
- Remote-first culture
- Professional development opportunities
fields.requirements:
5+ years of Django experience
Strong Python knowledge
PostgreSQL and Redis expertise
Docker and CI/CD pipelines
Excellent communication skills

fields.title: React Native Developer
fields.description:
Join our mobile team to build next-generation mobile applications. We're looking for experienced React Native developers who can ship quality code quickly.

Responsibilities:
- Develop cross-platform mobile apps
- Optimize performance for both iOS and Android
- Collaborate with UI/UX designers
- Participate in code reviews

What we offer:
- Competitive compensation
- Health insurance
- Learning budget
- Collaborative environment
fields.requirements:
3+ years React Native experience
JavaScript/TypeScript proficiency
iOS and Android knowledge
Git and version control
Agile methodology experience

fields.title: DevOps Engineer
fields.description:
We're hiring a DevOps Engineer to manage and improve our cloud infrastructure. You'll work with Kubernetes, Docker, and AWS to keep our systems running smoothly.

Responsibilities:
- Design and maintain cloud infrastructure
- Implement CI/CD pipelines
- Monitor system performance
- Implement security best practices
- On-call rotation support

What we offer:
- Excellent salary package
- Stock options
- Unlimited PTO
- Remote work opportunity
fields.requirements:
4+ years DevOps experience
Kubernetes and Docker expertise
AWS or GCP knowledge
Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
Monitoring and logging tools (Prometheus, ELK)

fields.title: Full Stack Developer
fields.description:
Exciting opportunity to work as a Full Stack Developer in a fast-growing startup. Build web applications from frontend to backend using modern technologies.

Responsibilities:
- Develop full-stack web applications
- Design database schemas
- Implement responsive UIs
- Write tests and documentation
- Collaborate with product team

What we offer:
- Startup equity
- Flexible hours
- Modern tech stack
- Growth opportunities
fields.requirements:
2+ years full-stack development
React/Vue.js knowledge
Node.js or Python backend
Database design skills
Version control (Git)

fields.title: Financial Analyst
fields.description:
Join our Finance team as a Financial Analyst. Analyze financial data, prepare reports, and support strategic planning. Work with executive leadership on key financial decisions.

Responsibilities:
- Financial modeling and forecasting
- Budget preparation and analysis
- Data analysis and reporting
- Support strategic planning
- Regulatory compliance

What we offer:
- Competitive salary
- Bonus structure
- Professional certifications support
- Career development
fields.requirements:
Bachelor's in Finance or Accounting
2+ years financial analysis
Excel and SQL expertise
Understanding of financial statements
Analytical and problem-solving skills

fields.title: Registered Nurse
fields.description:
We're seeking compassionate Registered Nurses to join our hospital team. Provide excellent patient care in a supportive environment with modern medical facilities.

Responsibilities:
- Patient assessment and monitoring
- Medication administration
- Patient education
- Collaborate with medical teams
- Maintain accurate records

What we offer:
- Competitive healthcare benefits
- Shift differentials
- Continuing education
- Supportive work environment
fields.requirements:
RN License (current and valid)
BSN or ASN
2+ years clinical experience
BLS/CPR certification
Excellent communication skills

fields.title: Digital Marketing Manager
fields.description:
Lead our digital marketing initiatives and drive brand growth. Develop strategies across multiple channels including social media, email, and content marketing.

Responsibilities:
- Develop marketing strategies
- Manage social media presence
- Create content calendar
- Analyze marketing metrics
- Budget management

What we offer:
- Competitive salary
- Performance bonus
- Flexible work schedule
- Creative freedom
fields.requirements:
3+ years digital marketing
Social media expertise
Content marketing knowledge
Data analysis skills
Proficiency in marketing tools (HubSpot, Google Analytics)

fields.title: High School Math Teacher
fields.description:
Join our faculty as a High School Math Teacher. Inspire students, develop curriculum, and foster a love for mathematics in a supportive school environment.

Responsibilities:
- Teach algebra and geometry
- Prepare lesson plans
- Assess student progress
- Engage parents
- Participate in school activities

What we offer:
- Competitive salary
- Health insurance
- Pension plan
- Professional development
fields.requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Mathematics or Education
High School Teacher Certification
2+ years teaching experience
Strong subject knowledge
Passion for education

fields.title: UX/UI Designer
fields.description:
We're looking for a talented UX/UI Designer to create beautiful and intuitive digital experiences. Work on web and mobile applications used by millions.

Responsibilities:
- Design user interfaces
- Conduct user research
- Create wireframes and prototypes
- Collaborate with developers
- Implement design systems

What we offer:
- Creative environment
- Modern design tools
- Competitive salary
- Remote flexibility
fields.requirements:
3+ years UX/UI design
Figma or Adobe XD expertise
Portfolio with strong examples
Understanding of design principles
Collaboration skills

fields.title: Data Scientist
fields.description:
Join our data science team to solve complex business problems with machine learning and data analytics. Work with cutting-edge technologies and large datasets.

Responsibilities:
- Develop machine learning models
- Analyze business data
- Create data visualizations
- Collaborate with engineering
- Present insights to stakeholders

What we offer:
- Competitive compensation
- Flexible schedule
- Cutting-edge tools
- Growth opportunities
fields.requirements:
Master's in Data Science, Computer Science, or related field
2+ years data science experience
Python and SQL proficiency
Machine learning knowledge
Statistics expertise
